title: Haman Is Executed
summary: At Esther’s second banquet, she reveals her Jewish identity and exposes Haman’s plot to destroy her people. The king is enraged and orders Haman to be executed on the very gallows he had prepared for Mordecai.

faq.question: What does Esther reveal to the king?
faq.answer: That she is Jewish and that Haman’s decree threatens her life and her people.

faq.question: What happens to Haman?
faq.answer: He is hanged on the gallows he built for Mordecai.
